Click to activate SU on Boot

Some apps need SU access after boot this helps to give app access, this will enable SU at boot helps but doesn\â€™t guarantee because there is the chance a particularly app start on Boot before iSu can enable SU

No Kernel Reboot Support!!!\nYou can\'t reboot with SU turned off or SU access will be gone.

Are you? Activating and deactivating SU just to read my Jokes? Just click iSu icon below :)
iSu by bhb27
About iSu
Developer information:
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/isu
Version:
A simple app to deactivate SU at will and pass safety net verification, today it works only on SU binary of CM base ROM\'s
XDA support forum site
Email
fglfgl27@gmail.com
GitHub
There is no email client installed on the device.
There is no web browser installed on the device.
